Colin Powell said this partnership is based on solid foundations of cooperation in politics, economics, and security and should be strongly encouraged. Kanat Saudabayev briefed Colin Powell on the outcome of Kazakhstan's OSCE chairmanship and the decisions of the Astana summit, the ministry reported. The meeting with Former National Security Adviser Brent Scowcroft discussed the current state and prospects of the nuclear nonproliferation regime, as well as development of nuclear power in the world.
